vulnerability_findings.name: pragma
vulnerability_findings.message:
Different versions of Solidity is used in ERC827.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.13', '^0.4.18']
	- ERC827.sol#3 declares pragma solidity^0.4.18
	- ERC827.sol#20 declares pragma solidity^0.4.18
	- ERC827.sol#35 declares pragma solidity^0.4.13

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in ERC827.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (ERC827.sol#3): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (ERC827.sol#20): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (ERC827.sol#35): it allows old versions
